text: The 2018–19 season was Al-Faisaly's 9th consecutive season in Pro League, the top flight of Saudi Arabian football, and their 65th year in existence. Along with the Pro League, the club competed in the King Cup. The season covers the period from 1 July 2018 to 30 June 2019. ==Players== ===Squad information=== ==Transfers== ===In=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left" |- ! Date ! Pos. ! Name !
